## Contact Info

Hours of Operation:

Monday - Friday:  
8 am - 3 pm  
**Please call for Appointment**

Phone:

(603) 465-2209, ext. 101

Address:

Town Hall

7 Monument Square

Hollis, NH 03049

United States

See map: [Google Maps](https://maps.google.com/?q=7%20Monument%20Square%2C%20Hollis%2C%20NH%2C%2003049%2C%20us)

Meetings - When: 2nd and 4th Monday of the month

Meetings - Where: Community Room, Hollis Town Hall

Meetings - Time: 6:30 PM
